page.title: 18FARM STUDY-IVY HOUSE FARM 3
page.content: The milk production is controlled by European Economic Community quotas which were recently brought in.Mr Willis had to sell 4 cows because of this.The present production is about 550 litres a day.The cows are milked mechanically twice daily in a milking parlour with four stalls.The{milk}is collected by tanker and is taken to a{ {dairy}in Ashby de-la-Zouch.{Farming} equipment an{machinery}on this farm is mostly quite aged because there is not much spare money for investment.The list is as follows:-Ford 6600 tractor,Ford 4000 tractor,Ford 3000 tractor,combine harvester,mowing machine,forage harvester,2 fertilizer spreaders,potato and bale elevators, hedge cutters,2 potato riddlers, potato planter,2 flat trailers, 3 tipping trailers,power harrow, spring tine harrow and corn drill.
